list_definition.definition: an outdoor game played with bats, a ball and wickets, between two sides of eleven each

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was watching a game of cricket on the TV.

list_definition.definition: an insect related to the grasshopper, the male of which makes a chirping noise.
